StoryText: I head downstairs in the middle of the night because I hear noises and see a spirit rummaging through our kitchen.
Question: What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Go yell to the spirit that I command it to leave
Grab some leftovers from the fridge and pull them out

OptionResult.Result: I hide out in the bedroom and the next morning %FullName:NPC:1% gets mad at me and blames me for leaving the fridge open and letting all our food go bad.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I did not want to deal with that spirit, it seemed hungry and who knows what else. I hid in the bedroom and eventually fell asleep. But the next morning %FullName:NPC:1% gets mad at me because %Pron:1:1% thinks I left the fridge open in the middle of the night and let all the food go bad. Now, we need to buy all new food... and it wasn't even me!

OptionResult.Result: The spirit is angered and lashes out and attacks me and then vanishes.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% comes downstairs to see me injured and bleeding and has to take me to the hospital. I tell %Pron:1:2% what happened and %Pron:1:1% is stunned. I thought I could command the spirit to leave but it didn't work... and it actually was able to touch me... and hurt me. I'm still in such shock.

OptionResult.Result: The spirit sees the food in my hands and follows me. I walk outside and set the food out there and the spirit leaves our place.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I originally was just trying to help this spirit which seemed to want food. Then as it followed me I decided to lead it outside. It actually followed me outside and I left the food out there, ran inside and shut the door. And I haven't seen or heard this spirit since then. I guess all it wanted was some food. But then %FullName:NPC:1% gets mad at me for "eating all the leftovers." Oh well.
